summary:
brain: crowley uses the “updog” trick on aziraphale

big brain: adam gets aziraphale and crowley both on “updog”

galaxy brain:...
body:
brain: crowley uses the “updog” trick on aziraphale

big brain: adam gets aziraphale and crowley both on “updog”

galaxy brain: aziraphale hears the “updog” joke from one of the Them and uses it on crowley, who falls for it surprisingly easily. ( “angel, what are you even saying?” “oh, you know ...” a wave of his hand, “updog! crowley, dear, do you not know what updog is?” ) 

is smug about it for the next decade and tells the story to anyone who will listen.

summary: Allow Me This - BlueSpect - Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett [Archive of Our Own]
title: Allow Me This - BlueSpect - Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/?
Fandom: Good Omens - Neil Gaiman

Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence

Relationships: Aziraphale/Crowley (Good Omens)

Characters: Aziraphale (Good Omens), Crowley (Good Omens)

Additional Tags: Angst, Biblical References, Historical Inaccuracy, probably, False Memories, Flashbacks, BAMF Aziraphale (Good Omens), Friendship, Mild Language, How Do I Tag, no beta we die like men

Summary:

Aziraphale finds himself trapped within his own mind and stripped of something very important. If only he could remember what it was.

—

Chapter 2 is up and I’ve figured out how to link footnotes (only took a couple days of frustration and rage quitting)

Anyway, let the angst commence.

summary:
Alas...
But at least we got this:
🎼 🎵 🎶
“There was a period last summer, where at the beginning of the summer, when we were in...
body:
Good Omens and Bohemian Rhapsody

Alas…

But at least we got this:

🎼 🎵 🎶


“There was a period last summer, where at the beginning of the summer, when we were in post-production, where Queen was going, ‘Yeah, you can have some of the songs, but certainly not “Bohemian Rhapsody,” because the film is going to come out and we want to keep the timeline clear.’ We kinda got that,” Mackinnon said, adding that Queen guitarist Brian May was supportive throughout the whole process.“

But the film’s production troubles — Bryan Singer was fired as director at the end of 2017 — caused Queen to reconsider, according to Mackinnon. “And I think Queen was going, ‘Well, maybe the film is not going to be so good, so you can have the rights.‘”

“Happily for everyone, the film turns out to be a great film and one of the biggest splashes of the year. But we still had the rights. If the timeline for the release of ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’ had been right alongside ours, I completely get why it would’ve been strange for Queen to have ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’ flying around with us as well as with them,” Mackinnon said.

Bohemian Rhapsody in Good Omens

But the film’s production troubles — Bryan Singer was fired as director at the end of 2017 — caused Queen to reconsider, according to Mackinnon. “And I think Queen was going, ‘Well, maybe the film is not going to be so good, so you can have the rights.‘”

Good Omens and Bohemian Rhapsody

Alas…

But at least we got this:

🎼 🎵 🎶


“There was a period last summer, where at the beginning of the summer, when we were in post-production, where Queen was going, ‘Yeah, you can have some of the songs, but certainly not “Bohemian Rhapsody,” because the film is going to come out and we want to keep the timeline clear.’ We kinda got that,” Mackinnon said, adding that Queen guitarist Brian May was supportive throughout the whole process.“

But the film’s production troubles — Bryan Singer was fired as director at the end of 2017 — caused Queen to reconsider, according to Mackinnon. “And I think Queen was going, ‘Well, maybe the film is not going to be so good, so you can have the rights.‘”

“Happily for everyone, the film turns out to be a great film and one of the biggest splashes of the year. But we still had the rights. If the timeline for the release of ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’ had been right alongside ours, I completely get why it would’ve been strange for Queen to have ‘Bohemian Rhapsody’ flying around with us as well as with them,” Mackinnon said.

Bohemian Rhapsody in Good Omens

summary: i was talking to my friend about good omens, describing aziraphale and crowley’s relationship as it is, and naturally she asks...
body: i was talking to my friend about good omens, describing aziraphale and crowley’s relationship as it is, and naturally she asks me “are they gay?” and i’m trying to think of an honest answer to this because “yes” isn’t technically accurate but “no” isn’t either because they could be, so i stumble through something awkward about authorial intent vs. fan interpretation, and conclude with a solid “maybe.” and she goes quiet for a moment, thinks everything over, and then proclaims “they need j.k. rowling”

summary: Good Omens AU where everything is the same except the Bentley is alive. It doesn't talk or anything, in fact, if you didn't pay...
body:
Good Omens AU where everything is the same except the Bentley is alive. It doesn’t talk or anything, in fact, if you didn’t pay it very, extremely close attention you’d never even notice so most people don’t know about this. There is no specific reason for it being that way either, it’s simply a hell car, and what better way to make your car hellish than put organs inside of it.

Crowley puts sandwiches under the hood and after he closes it they just disappear, Aziraphale is horrified at the concept

summary: At heart, Amazon’s Good Omens is a gay cosmic rom-com
body:
At heart, Amazon’s Good Omens is a gay cosmic rom-com

“Good Omens is, at its heart, a cosmic gay rom-com, with bad-boy Crowley tempting Aziraphale to get out of his comfort zone and enjoy life, while Aziraphale simultaneously lures him into being a better, less selfish person. The duo haltingly come together, fall apart under the strain of the events around them and their conflicting moralities, and inevitably come together again to save the day and each other. The rifts in their relationship are felt far more keenly than any instance of demonic mass murder. Their story is so bright and captivating that it’s well worth watching, even if it makes the rest of the show pale by comparison.”

summary: This was my headcannon for Aziraphales‘ bookshop reading Good Omens for the first time (though, after I‘ve been to Treadwell‘s...
body:
This was my headcannon for Aziraphales‘ bookshop reading Good Omens for the first time (though, after I‘ve been to Treadwell‘s for the first time, I might have another one now).

This lovely bookshop is on the basement floor of Stables Market (Camden Town). They take donations for old books and resell them in this chaotic little labyrinth of books. I actually got my first paperback of Good Omens from them.

Everytime I come to London I visit them for old hardback copies, today I found some poetry to rebind when I‘m back home!

summary:
Are you simply bored and looking for something to watch?
Or are you an author trying to find a new trope for your OTP?
Then I...
body:
Dear people of Tumblr,

Are you simply bored and looking for something to watch?

Or are you an author trying to find a new trope for your OTP?

Then I have just the movie for you!

This movie includes an accidental marriage:

Someone almost drowning but making fun of it later:

An awkward and relatable main character:

The two main characters being locked in a room and deciding to get drunk because they hate each other (enemies to friends to lovers trope anyone 😉):

The most beautiful and romantic scene involving a deaf, elderly couple:

And of course, simply the fact that David Tennant is wearing THIS:

Wanna know what this wonderful RomCom is called?

The Decoy Bride (2011)

So go ahead, try it out!

Just think of all the wonderful fanfictions that could be made based off of this amazing movie. Just imagine your OTP in this plot. Isn’t it brilliant?

Trust me, you won’t regret this.

(no photo or gif used is mine. all belong to owner.)

(no photo or gif used is mine. all belong to owner.)
trail.content:
Dear people of Tumblr,

Are you simply bored and looking for something to watch?

Or are you an author trying to find a new trope for your OTP?

Then I have just the movie for you!

This movie includes an accidental marriage:

Someone almost drowning but making fun of it later:

An awkward and relatable main character:

The two main characters being locked in a room and deciding to get drunk because they hate each other (enemies to friends to lovers trope anyone 😉):

The most beautiful and romantic scene involving a deaf, elderly couple:

And of course, simply the fact that David Tennant is wearing THIS:

Wanna know what this wonderful RomCom is called?

The Decoy Bride (2011)

So go ahead, try it out!

Just think of all the wonderful fanfictions that could be made based off of this amazing movie. Just imagine your OTP in this plot. Isn’t it brilliant?

Trust me, you won’t regret this.

(no photo or gif used is mine. all belong to owner.)

tags: once crowley finds out he uses the opportunity to moon heaven
summary: love the idea of a heaven and hell cam because it just implies that heaven and hell have been watching these two dorks and not...
body: love the idea of a heaven and hell cam because it just implies that heaven and hell have been watching these two dorks and not doing anything about it because they’re at this point all HEAVILY invested in the outcome of the world’s literal slowest burn. there are watch parties for every dinner out to the ritz. gabriel claimed the entire nineteenth century for the betting pool and then stewed the whole time as crowley slept, after which he claimed the pool was sinful. in hell, one of the most popular tortures is just a montage of crowley and aziraphale almost getting it but then not–long stares across crowded rooms, drunk snuggles that nearly turn to kisses but then don’t. the reason aziraphale was sent back so damn quickly after being called up by metatron was because he got to heaven and everyone crowded around the telly just shouted KISS HIM ALREADY before shooing him out the damn door, leaving aziraphale blinking confusedly in someone else’s body. the stopping of armageddon had slightly less to do with adam young than it did with the fact that crowley had just taken aziraphale’s hand, and everyone was too busy holding their breath to show up for it.
